copute jack knive

Source: R/utilities.R
my_jackknife.Rd

copute jack knive

my_jackknife(xdata, .method, ...)

Arguments

xdata

matrix
.method

method i.e. cor, parameters
...

further parameters to .method

Value

list with all jackknife matrices

See also

Other utilities: INTERNAL_FUNCTIONS_BY_FAMILY, jackknifeMatrix(), matrix_to_tibble(), multigroupVolcano(), pairs_smooth(), pairs_w_abline(), panel.cor(), panel.hist(), removeNArows(), split2table(), table_facade.list(), table_facade()

Examples

xx <- matrix(rnorm(20), ncol=4)
cortest <- function(x){print(dim(x));cor(x)}
my_jackknife(xx, cortest)

#> [1] 4 4
#> [1] 4 4
#> [1] 4 4
#> [1] 4 4
#> [1] 4 4
#> [1] 5 4
my_jackknife(xx, cor, use="pairwise.complete.obs", method="pearson")
